mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from BG_EXAMINE_TASK
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update BG_EXAMINE_TASK
TASK_ID = #{record.taskId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TASK_TITLE = #{record.taskTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_SPECIFIC_CONTENT = #{record.taskSpecificContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_PUBLISH_PERSON = #{record.taskPublishPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXAMINE_TARGET = #{record.examineTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_BEGIN_TIME = #{record.taskBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TASK_END_TIME = #{record.taskEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMPANY_ID = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_MODIFY_DATE = #{record.lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update BG_EXAMINE_TASK set TASK_ID = #{record.taskId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TASK_TITLE = #{record.taskTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_SPECIFIC_CONTENT = #{record.taskSpecificContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_PUBLISH_PERSON = #{record.taskPublishPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXAMINE_TARGET = #{record.examineTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_BEGIN_TIME = #{record.taskBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TASK_END_TIME = #{record.taskEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMPANY_ID = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_MODIFY_DATE = #{record.lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update BG_EXAMINE_TASK
TASK_TITLE = #{taskTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_SPECIFIC_CONTENT = #{taskSpecificContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_PUBLISH_PERSON = #{taskPublishPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXAMINE_TARGET = #{examineTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_BEGIN_TIME = #{taskBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TASK_END_TIME = #{taskEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_MODIFY_DATE = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where TASK_ID = #{taskId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update BG_EXAMINE_TASK set TASK_TITLE = #{taskTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_SPECIFIC_CONTENT = #{taskSpecificContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_PUBLISH_PERSON = #{taskPublishPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXAMINE_TARGET = #{examineTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_BEGIN_TIME = #{taskBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TASK_END_TIME = #{taskEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_MODIFY_DATE = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where TASK_ID = #{taskId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
